summary: In this witty comedy from teen director Emily Hagins, young Kate visits a local comic convention and falls for good-hearted vampire Paul, but her friends are worried when she suddenly starts displaying eerie, undead qualities of her own.
cast: Elaine Hurt|Patrick Delgado|Santiago Dietche|Lauren Lee|Tony Vespe|Lauren Vunderink|Devin Bonn√©e|Sam Eidson|Tina Rodriguez|Aaron Morgan|Harry Jay Knowles|Christopher Gonzalez|Rebecca Robinson|Ben Gonzalez|Megan Hagins|Travis Owens|John Gholson|Brigeda Hernandez|Rosalind Faires|Amani DeHolton|Emily Hagins|Bianca Allaine|Michael Scaccia|Blair Robbins|Amanda Haight|Mike McCutchen|J.J. Weber|Lina Green|Paul Gandersman|Jessica Bradley|Diana DeLaTorre|Don Daro|Clint Hansen|Max Kruemcke
title: My Sucky Teen Romance
